Text.Page:
Several patrols were attacked by some unusual flaming creatures.

I want to study them. Stalk and kill some {@LinkCreature:23#9#molten fangspawns} and collect their cores.

That should give me a clue to a more permanent solution.

These will do nicely. I'll begin my studies at once.

Whooâ€”still hot!

If we don't get the cores, these creatures could get out of hand.

Imagine an army of molten fangspawns marching on Pora Elinu. Now get back out there and get me those cores.
